'''Trillion Trinket Trawl''' is a subevent during [[Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl 1.png
|text1  = Follow Dvorak's checklist by defeating specific monsters, collecting designated Teyvat regional specialties, or using the photo-taking function to take pictures of specific targets to obtain the corresponding venue decorations.
|image2 = Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl 2.png
|text2  = You can go to {{Color|help|Dvorak}} to decorate the venue and make it more complete.
}}

==Stages==
===I - Obtaining Components===
;Unlocks 2024-05-06 10{{Colon}}00
{{Description|Defeat Ruin machines, Primal Constructs, and clockwork meka to obtain lamp-making components.}}
{{Description|'''Dvorak:''' That should be enough materials. Could you please bring them back to me?|After defeating all enemies}}

;Search Guide
{|class="article-table tdc1"
!Enemy
!Guide Text
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 01 01.png|200px]]<br>Ruin Machines
|Legends hold that these are war machines left behind by a now-destroyed nation. They can be found {{Color|help|throughout}} Teyvat.
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 01 02.png|200px]]<br>Primal Construct
|The guardians of the ancient ruins lost amidst the sands. They can be found in the {{Color|help|deserts of Sumeru}}.
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 01 03.png|200px]]<br>Clockwork Meka
|Exquisite machines with a variety of types and functions. They can be found in {{Color|help|Fontaine}}, both on land and in its waters.
|}

===II - Set Material Procurement===
;Unlocks 2024-05-08 04{{Colon}}00
{{Description|Photograph birds, dogs, and cats to collect materials for the set.}}
{{Description|'''Dvorak:''' Once we have these pictures, we can use them as raw material to start our work on the set. I'd be thankful if you could bring them back to me.|After taking all photographs}}

;Search Guide
{|class="article-table tdc1"
!Animal
!Guide Text
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 02 01.png|200px]]<br>Birds
|Beauteous creatures with wings and bodies covered in colorful feathers, their range includes nearly the entirety of Teyvat. Should you wish to gaze upon their gorgeousness, the {{Color|help|Fountain of Lucine}} is an excellent location...
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 02 02.png|200px]]<br>Dogs
|Loyal and reliable creatures, humanity's best friend. They travel the seven nations of Teyvat alongside humans. It is said that Fontainians especially enjoy their company, and cute canines can be found in every avenue and alley of the {{Color|help|Court of Fontaine}}.
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 02 03.png|200px]]<br>Cats
|Agile and wise creatures, they maintain their innate elegance and pride, and can be found throughout Teyvat. It is said that they often appear around {{Color|help|Asase Shrine}}, and are now synonymous with the sights there.
|}

;Rewards
{|class="article-table"
!Objective
!Rewards
|-
|Photograph 2 types of [[birds]]
|{{Card List|delim=;|Primogem*20;Iridescence Tour Tickets*20;Mora*40,000;Hero's Wit*5}}
|-
|Photograph 2 types of [[dogs]]
|{{Card List|delim=;|Primogem*20;Iridescence Tour Tickets*20;Mora*40,000;Hero's Wit*5}}
|-
|Photograph 2 types of [[cats]]
|{{Card List|delim=;|Primogem*20;Iridescence Tour Tickets*20;Mora*40,000;Hero's Wit*5}}
|}

===III - Decoration Creation===
;Unlocks 2024-05-10 04{{Colon}}00
{{Description|Gather Starconches, Sango Pearls, and leafy green products of Teyvat to make the decorations needed to dress the venue.}}
{{Description|'''Dvorak:''' That should be enough materials. Could you please bring them back to me?|After collecting all materials}}

;Search Guide
{|class="article-table tdc1"
!Animal
!Guide Text
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 03 01.png|200px]]<br>Sango Pearls
|Pearls always found with corals that give off a slight chill, reminiscent of moonlight. They can be found on {{Color|help|Watatsumi Island}}.
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 03 02.png|200px]]<br>Starconches
|Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea. Can be collected from {{Color|help|the beaches of Liyue}}.
|-
|[[File:Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness Trillion Trinket Trawl Search Guide 03 03.png|200px]]<br>Teyvat Products with Green Leaves
|A natural product of Teyvat that grows green leaves and radiates vitality, they are eminently suitable decorations for a rock'n'roll concert venue with a theme of celebrating "life." They can be gathered {{Color|help|throughout}} the continent of Teyvat.
|}

;Rewards
{|class="article-table"
!Objective
!Rewards
|-
|Gather 3 [[Sango Pearl]]s
|{{Card List|delim=;|Primogem*20;Iridescence Tour Tickets*20;Mora*40,000;Hero's Wit*5}}
|-
|Gather 3 [[Starconch]]es
|{{Card List|delim=;|Primogem*20;Iridescence Tour Tickets*20;Mora*40,000;Hero's Wit*5}}
|-
|Gather 3 types of Teyvat products with green leaves
|{{Card List|delim=;|Primogem*20;Iridescence Tour Tickets*20;Mora*40,000;Hero's Wit*5}}
|}

==Trivia==
* During ''Stage II - Set Material Procurement'', photographing animals with a given name (pets, etc.) will show their given name in the frame instead of the species' name.
